keys: marco de aceleración de la referencia
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>72080</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120215</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120215</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vrteči se opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">Rotating Reference Frames</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drehende Bezugsfelder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trames Tournantes de Référence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frames Girando Da Referência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strutture Di Rotazione Di Riferimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιστρεφόμενα πλαίσια αναφοράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Marcos De la Referencia Que rotan</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Primerjava zaznave okolice glede na mirojoče stanje in glede na vrteče stanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Comparison of how we detect surrounding when viewed from zero-momentum reference frame and from rotating reference frame.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pospešeni opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">accelerating reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleich von, wie wir das Umgeben entdecken, wenn 
sie vom Nullmomentum Bezugsfeld und von drehendem Bezugsfeld angesehen
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparaison de la façon dont nous détectons 
l'entourage une fois visualisés de la trame de référence de 
zéro-élan et de la trame tournante de référence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparação de como nós detectamos cercar quando 
vistos do frame da referência do zero-zero-momentum e do frame 
girando da referência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confronto di come rileviamo circondare una volta 
osservati dalla struttura di riferimento di zero-quantità di moto e 
dalla struttura di rotazione di riferimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκριση για το πώς ανιχνεύουμε να περιβάλουμε όταν 
εμφανίζεται από το πλαίσιο αναφοράς μηδέν-ορμής και από το 
περιστρεφόμενο πλαίσιο αναφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comparación de cómo detectamos rodear cuando 
están vistos de marco de la referencia del cero-i'mpetu y de marco de
la referencia que rota.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschleunigenbezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame d'accélération de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame de aceleração da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura accelerare di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιταχύνοντας πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">marco de aceleración de la referencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">marco de la referencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
